data.message: Hated beards ....until now !!! .. need a come back . Writing this as I listen to "my dad's gone crazy "  today's music is missing the big blow up like it was not long ago when em . And d12 and missy elliot  50   were constantly on the screens . And ems videos were majority hilarious  (lose it !...class)  what an era that was ... what I wouldn't give to see Eminem close up in concert .. I know your Briefly at Leeds festival . Which I couldn't get tickets for grrrrr!  Need to see you live .. bucket list .... only thing on it ha x   sending love from Lil old town in Lancashire UK x

replies.message: It's a crazy song I like it from d12. Cool Eminem some of your friends? Look to the moneyclock and you who is the problem from left to right. All the same...
